page.title: 11Clubs - National
page.content:
We visited farmers in the area and discovered that the majority of them belonged to one or several clubs or societies in the surrounding district. The farmers belong to the National Farmers Union, which is an organ- isation that speaks for the farmers interests on group, county and national levels. The Young Farmers' Clubs are extremely popular with their many social and educational activities
Many of the ladies also attend the Women's Institute at Pembridge, which is also an organisation on three levels.
The farmers who breed pedigree livestock belong to their respective breed societies. One farmers wife belongs to the Farm Womens Union which promotes British food.
